languages.text: {n}Ксенос издает раздраженное шипение.{/n} "Маленький мон-кай запомнил имя архонта? Какая редкая сообразительность... возможно, из тебя получится неплохой питомец. После должной выучки, которая выбьет из тебя твою неуместную спесь".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ксенос издает раздраженное шипение.{/n} "Маленький мон-кай запомнил имя архонта? Какая редкая сообразительность... возможно, из тебя получится неплохой питомец. После должной выучки, которая выбьет из тебя твою неуместную спесь".

languages.text: {n}The xenos lets out a hiss of irritation.{/n} "The little mon-keigh remembered the Archon's name? Such a clever thing you are... You might just make a good pet — after you have been properly trained and stripped of your misplaced arrogance."
languages.original_text: {n}Ксенос издает раздраженное шипение.{/n} "Маленький мон-кай запомнил имя архонта? Какая редкая сообразительность... возможно, из тебя получится неплохой питомец. После должной выучки, которая выбьет из тебя твою неуместную спесь".

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos lets out a hiss of irritation.{/n} "The little mon-keigh remembered the Archon's name? Such a clever thing you are... You might just make a good pet — after you have been properly trained and rid of your ill-suited arrogance."

{n}The xenos lets out a hiss of irritation.{/n} "The little mon-keigh remembered the Archon's name? Such a clever thing you are... You might just make a good pet — after you have been properly trained and stripped of your misplaced arrogance."

{n}The xenos lets out a hiss of irritation.{/n} "The little mon-keigh remembered the Archon's name? Such a clever thing you are... You might just make a good pet — after you have been properly trained and stripped of your misplaced arrogance."

{n}The xenos lets out a hiss of irritation.{/n} "The little mon-keigh remembered the Archon's name? Such a clever thing you are... You might just make a good pet — after you have been properly trained and stripped of your misplaced arrogance."

languages.text: {n}这个异形发出了恼怒的嘶声。{/n}“你这只小猴子，居然还记得执政官的名字？你可真是个聪明的小东西……等我们好好训练训练你，消灭掉你的傲慢之后，说不定你会是只不错的宠物。”
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos lets out a hiss of irritation.{/n} "The little mon-keigh remembered the Archon's name? Such a clever thing you are... You might just make a good pet — after you have been properly trained and stripped of your misplaced arrogance."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个异形发出了恼怒的嘶声。{/n}“你这只小猴子，居然还记得执政官的名字？你可真是个聪明的小东西……等我们好好训练训练你，消灭掉你的傲慢之后，说不定你会是只不错的宠物。”

languages.text: {n}El xenos deja escapar un siseo de irritación.{/n} «¿{mf|El|La} pequeñ{mf|o|a} mon-keigh recuerda el nombre de la Arconte? Qué list{mf|o|a} eres... Podrías ser una buena mascota, una vez te entrene para arrebatarte esa arrogancia inmerecida».
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos lets out a hiss of irritation.{/n} "The little mon-keigh remembered the Archon's name? Such a clever thing you are... You might just make a good pet — after you have been properly trained and stripped of your misplaced arrogance."

traits.locale_text: {n}El xenos deja escapar un siseo de irritación.{/n} «¿{mf|El|La} pequeñ{mf|o|a} mon-keigh recuerda el nombre de la Arconte? Qué list{mf|o|a} eres... Podrías ser una buena mascota, una vez te entrene para arrebatarte esa arrogancia inmerecida».

languages.text: {n}異種族たちは不快感からシーッという威嚇音を出す。{/n}「モン＝ケイごときがアーコンの名を記憶しているだと？けっこう利口じゃないか…。お前らはペットにいいかもな…きちんと調教してひどく傲慢な態度を裸に剥いた後なら、だが」
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos lets out a hiss of irritation.{/n} "The little mon-keigh remembered the Archon's name? Such a clever thing you are... You might just make a good pet — after you have been properly trained and stripped of your misplaced arrogance."

traits.locale_text: {n}異種族たちは不快感からシーッという威嚇音を出す。{/n}「モン＝ケイごときがアーコンの名を記憶しているだと？けっこう利口じゃないか…。お前らはペットにいいかもな…きちんと調教してひどく傲慢な態度を裸に剥いた後なら、だが」

languages.original_text: {n}The xenos lets out a hiss of irritation.{/n} "The little mon-keigh remembered the Archon's name? Such a clever thing you are... You might just make a good pet — after you have been properly trained and stripped of your misplaced arrogance."

languages.text: {n}Le xénos laisse échapper un sifflement irrité.{/n} « Le petit mon-keigh se souvient du nom de l'archonte ? Il sait donc se servir de sa tête... Vous pourriez faire un bon animal de compagnie... une fois dompté et privé de cette arrogance inconvenante. »
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos lets out a hiss of irritation.{/n} "The little mon-keigh remembered the Archon's name? Such a clever thing you are... You might just make a good pet — after you have been properly trained and stripped of your misplaced arrogance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le xénos laisse échapper un sifflement irrité.{/n} « Le petit mon-keigh se souvient du nom de l'archonte ? Il sait donc se servir de sa tête... Vous pourriez faire un bon animal de compagnie... une fois dompté et privé de cette arrogance inconvenante. »

languages.text: {n}Der Xenos faucht irritiert.{/n} "Der kleine Chem-Pan-Sey erinnert sich an den Namen der Archontin? Ihr seid ganz schön clever ... Ihr würdet ein gutes Haustier abgeben – man müsste Euch nur gut trainieren und die fehlgeleitete Arroganz austreiben."
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos lets out a hiss of irritation.{/n} "The little mon-keigh remembered the Archon's name? Such a clever thing you are... You might just make a good pet — after you have been properly trained and stripped of your misplaced arrogance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Xenos faucht irritiert.{/n} "Der kleine Chem-Pan-Sey erinnert sich an den Namen der Archontin? Ihr seid ganz schön clever ... Ihr würdet ein gutes Haustier abgeben – man müsste Euch nur gut trainieren und die fehlgeleitete Arroganz austreiben."

languages.text: {n}Zeno irkilerek tıslıyor.{/n} "Minik mon-keigh'e bak sen, Arkon'un adını da mı hatırlarmış? Ne akıllıymışsın sen... Senden iyi evcil hayvan da olur. Tabii önce iyice eğitip şu kibrinden arındırmak gerek."
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos lets out a hiss of irritation.{/n} "The little mon-keigh remembered the Archon's name? Such a clever thing you are... You might just make a good pet — after you have been properly trained and stripped of your misplaced arrogance."
